alert.note: Alert for Schuyler; Seneca; Steuben; Yates (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Binghamton (South Central New York and Northeastern Pennsylvania)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued December 03 at 6:58PM EST by NWS Binghamton
info.description: ...STRONG THUNDERSTORMS WILL IMPACT SOUTHWESTERN SENECA...SCHUYLER... SOUTHERN YATES AND NORTHEASTERN STEUBEN COUNTIES THROUGH 745 PM EST... At 658 PM EST, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Prattsburg to near Hammondsport to Bath. Movement was east at 50 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Bath, Hector, Starkey, Urbana, Watkins Glen, Catharine, Dundee, Montour Falls, Tyrone, and Pulteney. This includes the following highway exits... Interstate 86/Route 17 between 36 and 40. Interstate 390 near 1. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
